Package bcompetition.Model

Class KABoxer

java.lang.Object
bcompetition.Model.KABoxer
Direct Known Subclasses:
NoviceBoxer, ProfessionalBoxer
public abstract class KABoxer extends Object
Abstract class representing a KABoxer in a boxing competition.

      Constructs a KABoxer with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      competitorId - The competitor's ID.
      competitorDetails - Details of the competitor (name, country, age, gender, etc.).
      competitorLvl - The competitor's level.
      competitorCategory - The competitor's category (Heavyweight, Middleweight, or Lightweight).
